dcterms:creator: A. Janusz
et al.
dcterms:description: A large volume dataset collected from a coal mine seismic monitoring system, used to predict increased seismic activities that endanger coal workers. The dataset is imbalanced, containing normal and warning class labels, with a total of 133,151 samples in the training set and 3,860 samples in the testing set.
dcterms:title: Coal Mine Seismic Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Chen
et al.
dcterms:description: A collection of benchmark datasets for time series classification, widely used for evaluating classification algorithms.
dcterms:title: UCR Benchmark Datasets
